Result Search Add New Sale Add New Rent
Outn Definition of the application The application aims to make the sale and rental of real estate very easy, and brings the distances closer and gives all parties a golden opportunity to communicate no matter how far away. We meant to designate the application as (outn), in the audio sense of the word, and it includes the outside and the inside, meaning that everyone can get acquainted with the real estate offered inside and outside the city as well as in any country in the world and conduct sales, purchases and rentals with ease and smoothness. The application gives individuals the opportunity to launch a platform for selling and renting real estate without the need for traditional offices and companies, just to create an account within the application it becomes possible to offer real estate for sale and rent, and communicate easily with customers. It also shows the brand name chosen by the person next to outn, and can be published and promoted through social media. The application opens doors for customers to choose real estate according to the specifications that they wish. Through the application, pictures of real estate, its specifications, prices and contact with its owners are displayed. The property can be searched for in a specific country or city and according to the required specifications. The application provides the easiest way to spread information about the property among people to promote it and introduce it. Outn App is the first global platform that allows individuals to launch their real estate companies without restrictions. And the name he chooses for his office or company appears immediately in the application, for example outn john.
